## GitHub Profile README Repository

This repository contains your GitHub profile README that displays on your profile page.

### Project Type
- Static Markdown Profile

### Completed Steps
- [x] Created .github directory and copilot-instructions.md
- [x] Created professional README.md with profile sections

### Profile Sections Included
- Introduction/About Me
- Skills & Technologies
- GitHub Stats
- Connect/Contact Information

### Customization Notes
- Update personal information in README.md
- Add your GitHub username for stats widgets
- Customize badges and icons to match your tech stack
- Replace placeholder content with your own details
